column4: how can i add two ip address on a lan connection coz my internet is 192.168.1.x and LAN is 192.168.0.x so i can connect in both
like setting a second IP on one NIC? e.g.  ifconfig eth0:1 192.168.0.55
how to add a second ip?
see above, the last was an example. you can also use the eth0:x naming in /etc/netowrking/interfaces and probably the netwok manager too
